results.originalPrompt: Diverse business team collaborating around a whiteboard with sticky notes and diagrams, natural office lighting, professional atmosphere

The office is naturally lit, giving the room a warm and welcoming ambiance. Each individual is engrossed in animated discussion, embodying the spirit of teamwork.

The overall setting embodies the spirit of professionalism complimented by modern aesthetics.
